stories.text: Hi, I am looking to start a company and need help with transferring my existing green card application to this new business. I am looking for the best immigration law firms that have experience with helping founders obtain green card. Please share if you know someone.

stories.text:
Hi, my name is HÃ©ctor, I'm currently running an agency that I look to transform into a startup. My goal is to help 1,000 smb's increase their sales by the end of 2022, currently I'm at 4 businesses who have grown with my agency. However, the only way in which I can accomplish my goal is by building something that is scalable. Hence the idea for Qusek: The Online Tool that will audit the digital presence of your business in only a few clicks and in less than 24 hrs.
If you know any startups or businesses that provide a similar value proposition I'd appreciate it if you leave their names in the comments. Thank you. I'll be posting weekly updates.
